Asset.Name: IronWorking
Asset.Description: Iron working is older than history itself. The first iron worked probably came from meteorites; when this useful material was not to be found, the ancient people probably looked elsewhere for similar materials. Iron "smelting" - the extraction of the metal from iron ore - appears to have been discovered in the 12th century BC, in the Caucuses Mountains, Asia Minor, or possibly India. The production of wrought iron dates from approximately 1,000 BC.
Asset.Quote: "Do not wait to strike 'til the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking." - William Butler Yeats
Asset.Notes: Reveals Iron and allows you to build the Swordsman, an extremely powerful melee unit which requires it.
